TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
By putting "?" at the end of a question.

Why blame yourself when you can blame entropy?

Because I'm a horrible person...

why blame entropy when you can blame enthalpy?

Edited March 27, 2014 by Endersmens

why blame entropy when you can blame enthopy?

Purple, because pigs cant fly! (Do I win for having a stupid response?)

Why is the sky green?
Probably because you're colorblind (welcome to the forums, BTW )

Probably because you're colorblind (welcome to the forums, BTW )

No question? guess i'll put one for you.

how do i know if somebody else is colorblind?

Because they have shutters over their eyes that block out colour. You can help them out by opening these blinds, though.

Why doesn't Google's dictionary have an option to correct in English (the proper one)?

Because it doesnt!!

What happens at absolute zero? (0 degrees kelvin)

Edited March 28, 2014 by gooddog15
Degrees

Nothing

What does space have oxygen

Because there is obviously a planet that is a plant.

Why does chuck norris not have his own planet

Because he's too rich.

How do I eat?

Edited March 28, 2014 by plainawesome
Forgot to add question

Get on top of youre roof and yell at the sky with a fork saying im eating for SPARTAAA!!!!!!!

How do i potato

E=mc2

Why does the tree yell at Jupiter?

For the same reason that fish ask the dirt questions about commercial banking.

Why all the fighting?

Because ducks.

How do i get my dog to fly in slow motion while an awesome fireworks display goes off in the backround with a firetruck spraying napalm destroying justin bieber cds

You say "Help I accidentally car" then explode Jebediah Kerman's rockets, and bribe him to do what you ask.

How do I procrastinate indefinitely?

Do a barrel roll!!!

How do i space chicken

Go to Space KFC.

What is the final number of Pi?

yes.

How do i gain weight? (seriously i weigh 135)

fast (i have that same problem too and i am 120)

how do i go up?

By falling into a trap where your brain is switched with an animals brain. Congrats, you are now a girraffe.

How do i make a pizza only with a rock & 2 wooden sticks?

Take it to the Hard Rock Cafe.

Why can't I build a rocket in real life?

Because you might rock it.

Would you like some help with the door?

no, me and the door are having a argument over weather nokia phones would survive being hit by a meteorite

can I have some mike & ikes?

Yes, but all the Ikes crush you after falling from Duna orbit somehow and multiplying via planetary mitosis somehow.

Would a Nokia survive a meteor impact?
The real question is, would a metor survive a nokia impact.
